name: MyMITMicroeconomicsFlashcards
0:
”Alexa, open microeconomics flashcards”
”Alexa, start microeconomics flashcards”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: microeconomics flashcards
des:
I am using Alexa to help me study for my Microeconomics test. You can use my deck to study with me and review my flashcards - send me feedback. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
This skill was created using a simple Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with me, the skill developer. But a thumbs up is motivating! Thank you.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
